statistics

Class CorrelationRatio

  • java.lang.Object
    • statistics.CorrelationRatio

  • public class CorrelationRatio
extends java.lang.Object
    The correlation ratio is a measure of the relationship between the statistical dispersion within individual categories and the dispersion across the whole population or sample.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CorrelationRatio(DataSet dset, int numCategories) 
      CorrelationRatio(DataSet dset, int numCategories, CombinedMetric cmet) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float getCorrelationRatio()
      Calculates the correlation ratio, based on the classes in the provided data set.
